td.content: s:a male nurse aged 25 yrs describes severe cough, severe fever, severe shortness of breath and Respiratory. he drinks 2 beers per night Patient does not smoke o:Height 63 in, Weight 123 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, actively coughing with sputum production - dark yellow, Neck = no JVD a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.
